messages.subject: RE: [nihonto] Re: Not sword related, ceramics
messages.msgSnippet: The list that I run is pretty much based on Antique Chinese and Japanese ceramics, but I think we do have members who have a substantial knowledge of modern
messages.messageBody:
The list that I run is pretty much based on Antique Chinese and Japanese
ceramics, but I think we do have members who have a substantial
knowledge of modern Asian Studio ceramics.

If anyone is interested :
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/chinese_ceramics/

- Matt

-----Oorspronkelijk bericht-----

Milt
